title: Plasma 6 Development Update: Unveiling Features Removals
description:

description:

title: Why Kolektiva.social Is a Warning for Activists Using Mastodon
description:
A Mastodon server that focuses on left-leaning political activists recently had an unencrypted copy of its database confiscated by the FBI.

The post Why Kolektiva.social Is a Warning for Activists Using Mastodon appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Ansible Creator Wants to Build a New Automation Platform in Rust
description:

title: GUADEC 2023 Conference Kicks Off in Riga for GNOME 45
description:
